Text: Amazing rip as always - you're the man! You got Weezer's first records?
This sounds incredible, thanks for sharing!

my friend you are making incredible rips,but tell me please you are converting to flac the files from album to its normal or the 24bits and 96000hz comes from when you converted it.i mean this quality is from the original album or converted even better.....

This is a great-sounding vinyl capture. There does appear to be some improvement to overall dynamic range in this version, but there's spots of compressed brickwalls that aren't on the CD version. The constant frequency response does seem to get up to around 3k. But all that being said, my ears prefer the CD version of the album. The higher frequencies sound clearer and more pronounced on the CD to me. To each their own, and like I said a great vinyl rip if you're into that sort of thing.
